title: Airbus Perlan Mission II takes flight
text: Airbus Perlan Mission II takes flight Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - At Robert’s Field Redmond Municipal Airport in Redmond, Ore., the Perlan 2 glider has successfully completed its first flight in what has been a landmark moment in global aviation history. ( ) RELATED LINKS - At Robert’s Field Redmond Municipal Airport in Redmond, Ore., the Perlan 2 glider has successfully completed its first flight in what has been a landmark moment in global aviation history.
